lyrics:
17 contributorsmind lyricsverse 1
he took his shirt off as he ran
from you so slowly away but i found him hes fine
i wasnt flirting as i am
deciding the loneliest heart in the living room was mine

verse 2
she wasnt trying to make a stand
oh you the only escape from her envy was her pride
well thats not really who i am
the deadliest sins are for those whove partaken and not i

prechorus
well it was only a matter of time

chorus
why dyou keep changing your mind
why dyou keep changing your mind

verse 3
carrying a plastic bag
threw up by your side just to show me im lonely again
well maybe i just aint a man
so loosely reduced to an infant dependant on wine

prechorus
well it was only a matter of time
see declan mckenna liveget tickets as low as 46you might also likechorus
why dyou keep changing your mind
why dyou keep changing your mind
why dyou keep changing your mind
why dyou keep changing your mind

bridge
i cant see clear again
i got myself stuck
and i wont come near again
im all out of luck

he took his shirt off as he ran
from you so slowly away but i found him hes fine

chorus
why dyou keep changing your mind
why dyou keep changing your mind
why dyou keep changing your mind
